title: PMS 2.0 360 - Najee Harris, Mark Madden, Eddie Olczyk  and AJ Hawk
description:
On today’s episode Pat and the boys dive right into the latest in Tiger Woods news. Potential first round pick, 2020 Doak Walker award winner and National Champion for the Alabama Crimson Tide running back Najee Harris joins the show to talk about the previous college season and the process heading into the NFL Draft. Pat then gets into the latest rumors in the NFL, Mark Madden joined Pat and boys to discuss the Steelers announcing they and Ben Roethlisberger have mutually agreed to bring him back as the quarterback for the 2021 season. AJ then joins the show to talk about an eye opening information about the NFL PA and one of their biggest stars. Hockey legend Eddie Olczyk joined the show to discuss the latest in the hockey world.

Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
